Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-48615 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.21.4-17
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-48615 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.21.4-17. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cmake is earlier than 3.21.4-17, affected by CVE-2024-48615
